configurations.name: live-server
runtimeArgs: const h=require('http'),f=require('fs'),p=require('path');h.createServer((q,r)=>{let u=q.url==='/'?'/index.html':q.url;let fp=p.join('.',u);let ext=p.extname(fp);let ct={'html':'text/html','css':'text/css','js':'application/javascript','json':'application/json','png':'image/png','jpg':'image/jpeg','svg':'image/svg+xml','ico':'image/x-icon'}[ext.slice(1)]||'application/octet-stream';f.readFile(fp,(e,d)=>{if(e){r.writeHead(404);r.end('Not found')}else{r.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':ct});r.end(d)}})}).listen(8080,()=>console.log('Server running on http://localhost:8080'))
